full_summary:
================.Alignment

**Eaton 9PX for Global Affairs Canada Tender Notice**
------------------------------------------------

### Tender Information

| **Field Name** | **Value** |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number | BPM018135/21772  |
| Amendment Number | 002  |
| Solicitation Date | February 3, 2023  |
| Tender Closing Date | February 24, 2023 14:00:00, Eastern Time |

### Tenders Description

The Solicitation is for the purchase of a High Performance Computing Server and related technical specifications.

### Bidding Instructions

- **Registration Procedure**
    * Bidders can register in the SSC P2P portal at [https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login) and follow the on-screen instructions.

### Submission Requirements

Tenders must be submitted electronically using the SSC P2P portal.

### Bi-Bidding Instructions

**Important Notes:**

- This solicitation is carried out in accordance with Public Services and Procurement Canada's (PSPC) contracting policies.
- Bidders must ensure that their bid conforms to all applicable laws, regulations, and standards.
- Tender evaluation will be based on criteria specified in the Tender Document.

### Invitations and Terms of Reference

The Tender Document may be obtained from the SSC P2P portal, as mentioned earlier.

### Available Attachments
[https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/BB5561CC-5E8D-4B85-B459-8109438496BB](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/BB5561CC-5E8D-4B85-B459-8109438496BB)

### Contractor Information

The contracting entity is Shared Services Canada (Canada). END OF ROOTbidb.</rootbid>893XXXX: !!!!5XXXender:</iadeceerral
